SubSections.Title: Most Loyal
SubSections.Content: You summon from any category.

SubSections.Title: Independent
SubSections.Content: The upkeep is replaced.

SubSections.Title: Duo
SubSections.Content: Whenever you attack a combatant close to the summon, or the summon attacks a combatant close to you, the attack gains advantage against the combatant.

SubSections.Title: Soulbound
SubSections.Content: You can use a quick action to teleport to an empty space within 4 meters of it.

SubSections.Title: Inseparable
SubSections.Content: The cooldown is removed.

SubSections.Title: Share Pain

Parts: After you take damage from an attack.

SubSections.Content: Choose 2 willing combatants within range. Each combatant takes [damage taken -/ 2] damage, and reduces the damage you take by the same amount.

SubSections.Title: Cooldown
SubSections.Content: The cooldown replaces the limits.

SubSections.Title: Kamikaze
SubSections.Content: Choose any number of them instead.

SubSections.Title: Folk Hero
SubSections.Content: All chosen combatants become strengthened 2 for 1 round.

SubSections.Title: Supreme General
SubSections.Content: While you control combatants with a combined upkeep of at least 3, you and all controlled combatants become protected.

SubSections.Title: Blind Faith
SubSections.Content: You and all controlled combatants also become zealous.

SubSections.Title: Medical Aid
SubSections.Content: You and all controlled combatants also become shielded.

SubSections.Title: Without Hesitation
SubSections.Content: You and all controlled combatants also become strengthened.

SubSections.Title: Perfect Order
SubSections.Content: You and all controlled combatants also become hastened.

SubSections.Title: Warlord
SubSections.Content: The damage of you and all controlled combatants is also increased by T1d8.

SubSections.Title: Promotion
SubSections.Content: Choose a controlled summon that has been on the battlefield for at least 3 rounds with an importance below 3. Its importance and upkeep are increased by 1, but its current health stays the same.

SubSections.Title: Limitless
SubSections.Content: The limit is removed.

SubSections.Title: Restore
SubSections.Content: Its health is restored.

SubSections.Title: Increased Growth
SubSections.Content: The limit is ignored for the combatant. After 3 rounds, the max resets for the combatant.

SubSections.Title: Trainer
SubSections.Content: Its attributes are increased by 1 and its damage is increased by T1d6 per promotion.

SubSections.Title: Yin
SubSections.Content: You gain T1 shield if you hit at least 1 attack since 1 round.

SubSections.Title: Yang
SubSections.Content: You lose all shield. The damage is increased by [shield lost].

SubSections.Title: Great Yin
SubSections.Content: You gain T2 shield instead per attack hit within 1 round.

SubSections.Title: Great Yang
SubSections.Content: You lose a number of shield of your choice instead, and the damage is increased by twice as much instead.

SubSections.Title: Qi Absorption
SubSections.Content: You gain T1 shield. The attacker loses up to T5 shield, and you gain shield equal to the shield it lost.

SubSections.Title: Force Absorption
SubSections.Content: You regain all shield lost from the attack.

SubSections.Title: Cooldown
SubSections.Content: The cooldown replaces the limits.

SubSections.Title: Quick Recovery
SubSections.Content: You gain shield equal to [lost health -/ 2].

SubSections.Title: Ascetic
SubSections.Content: The attacker gains disadvantage against you for 1 long round.

SubSections.Title: Meditate
SubSections.Content: You gain T10 shield.

SubSections.Title: Cooldown
SubSections.Content: The cooldown replaces the limit.

SubSections.Title: Fortify
SubSections.Content: You become fortified for 1 round.

SubSections.Title: Clear Mind
SubSections.Content: You lose all simple unstackable conditions of your choice.

SubSections.Title: Life Energy
SubSections.Content: You reserve up to T10 health. You gain additional [reserved health] shield.

SubSections.Title: Sage
SubSections.Content: All other combatants of your choice within range gain T5 shield.

SubSections.Title: Yin
SubSections.Content: Choose a willing combatant within reach to remove either collapsed, confused, freezing, grappled, paralyzed, revealed, or weakened from it. The combatant gains immunity to the condition for 1 round.

SubSections.Title: Yang

Parts: After you hit an attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes either collapsed, confused, freezing, grappled, paralyzed, revealed, or weakened for 1 round.

SubSections.Title: Cooldown
SubSections.Content: The cooldown replaces the limits.

SubSections.Title: Duration
SubSections.Content: The durations are increased to 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Scholar
SubSections.Content: You can choose 2 instead.

SubSections.Title: Absorb Shield
SubSections.Content: You gain [shield it lost from the attack] shield.

SubSections.Title: Cooldown
SubSections.Content: The cooldown replaces the limits.

SubSections.Title: Sundering
SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes sundered 2 against the attack.

SubSections.Title: Heavenly Demon
SubSections.Content: Before you hit the combatant, the damage is increased by [its shield].

SubSections.Title: Overflow
SubSections.Content: Choose an attack ability. After 2 rounds, the next time you use the ability it overflows. If an ability overflows, its damage is increased by T3d8, any number of targets are doubled, and any radius, length, and width are increased by half rounded down.

SubSections.Title: Lingering Overflow
SubSections.Content: After 1 round, all combatants within the area of the attack take T10 damage of the same types as the damage of the attack.

SubSections.Title: Controlled Overflow
SubSections.Content: You can exclude any number of combatants of your choice from the attack. The damage is increased by T4d8 instead.

SubSections.Title: Forced Overflow
SubSections.Content: You reserve T10 health. The startup duration and the action cost are removed.

SubSections.Title: Cataclysm
SubSections.Content: You gain 1 growth stack.

SubSections.Title: Unleash Cataclysm
SubSections.Content: You lose all stacks. The damage is increased by [lost stacks * T1]d8.

SubSections.Title: Saturation
SubSections.Content: The damage of all of your attacks is increased by T1d8 while you have at least 3 stacks. Additionally, when you use the unleash ability, you can choose to lose a number of stacks of your choice instead.

SubSections.Title: Breaking Point
SubSections.Content: While you have at least 3 stacks, the damage is increased by an additional T2d8.

SubSections.Title: Evoker
SubSections.Content: Once per combat, after you use the unleash ability, you regain all lost stacks.

SubSections.Title: Echo
SubSections.Content: After 2 rounds, the combatant receives [damage taken -/ 2] damage (metabolism).

SubSections.Title: Cooldown
SubSections.Content: The cooldown replaces the limit.

SubSections.Title: Full
SubSections.Content: The combatant receives [damage taken] damage instead.

SubSections.Title: Invoker
SubSections.Content: The effect repeats every 2 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Arcane Barrier
SubSections.Content: You summon an arcane barrier covering yourself. You cannot be hit until the barrier is destroyed.

SubSections.Title: Cooldown
SubSections.Content: The cooldown replaces the limit.

SubSections.Title: Self Repair
SubSections.Content: The cost is removed. You can use this at the start of combat.

SubSections.Title: Arcanist
SubSections.Content: While the barrier is active, you become strengthened.

SubSections.Title: Seeds Of Chaos
SubSections.Content: It gains 1 harvest stack. At the end of its turns, it gains 1 additional stack up to a maximum of 6. If a combatant with stacks dies, it loses all stacks, but you regain 1 use.

SubSections.Title: Harvest
SubSections.Content: Choose a combatant with harvest stacks from you. It becomes revealed, paralyzed, and vulnerable for 1 round with a severity of [stacks -/ 2]. It loses all stacks.

SubSections.Title: Double
SubSections.Content: The limit is replaced.

SubSections.Title: Duration
SubSections.Content: The duration is increased by [stacks -/ 2].

SubSections.Title: Chaos Mage
SubSections.Content: Upon harvest, you become zealous, focused, and strengthened for 1 round with a severity of [stacks -/ 2].

SubSections.Title: Sacrifice
SubSections.Content: You reserve T8 health. The damage is increased by [health reserved].

SubSections.Title: Vitality Recovery
SubSections.Content: You regain T2 reserved health.

SubSections.Title: Dangerous Sacrifice
SubSections.Content: You reserve a number of health of your choice instead, and you regain T4 instead.

SubSections.Title: Blood Sacrifice
SubSections.Content: All hit targets gain 2 bleeding stacks. The damage is increased by twice as much instead.

SubSections.Title: Demonic Sacrifice
SubSections.Content: At any time, your power is increased by [reserved health -/ 10].

SubSections.Title: Forbidden Rite
SubSections.Content: You reserve T5 health. The severity is increased by 1.

SubSections.Title: Cooldown
SubSections.Content: The cooldown replaces the limit.

SubSections.Title: Perfected
SubSections.Content: You reserve T15 health instead. The severity is increased by 2 instead.

SubSections.Title: Prophet
SubSections.Content: If the combatant loses the condition at the end of its full duration, you regain all health reserved for the condition in this way.

SubSections.Title: Grand Binding Ritual
SubSections.Content: You reserve T5 health. The combatant becomes grappled 2. While grappled in this way, it becomes poisoned, prone, and soulbound.

SubSections.Title: Multi
SubSections.Content: The limit is replaced.

SubSections.Title: Recharge
SubSections.Content: After 3 rounds, the limit is reset.

SubSections.Title: Ritualist
SubSections.Content: While grappled in this way, the combatant becomes vulnerable 2.

SubSections.Title: Absorb Vitality
SubSections.Content: You regain [its max health -/ 10] reserved health.

SubSections.Title: Double
SubSections.Content: The limit is replaced.

SubSections.Title: Efficient
SubSections.Content: You regain [its max health -/ 5] instead.

SubSections.Title: Hemomancer
SubSections.Content: Whenever a combatant within range dies, you regain T2 reserved health.

SubSections.Title: Soul Link
SubSections.Content: You reserve T5 health. The accuracy of your attacks is increased by 1 against it, and whenever you hit it, you regain T1 reserved health.

SubSections.Title: Impede
SubSections.Content: The accuracy is increased by 3 instead.

SubSections.Title: Resourceful
SubSections.Content: You regain T2 reserved health instead.

SubSections.Title: Soulweaver
SubSections.Content: The max is replaced.

SubSections.Title: Reverse Die
SubSections.Content: You invert the natural result (by subtracting it from 21).

SubSections.Title: Dice Swap

Parts: A combatant within range rolls a d20.

SubSections.Content: The trigger is replaced. If it rolled multiple d20, only the chosen one counts towards the final result.

SubSections.Title: Paradox
SubSections.Content: If it was rolled as part of an attack, its damage is increased by [result difference -/ 2 * T1]. If you invert a 1, the cooldown is reset.

SubSections.Title: Reality Fracture
SubSections.Content: The cooldown is replaced and the action cost is removed.

SubSections.Title: Glitch
SubSections.Content: You reduce the success level by 1 against you.

SubSections.Title: Cooldown
SubSections.Content: The cooldown replaces the limit.

SubSections.Title: Mirror
SubSections.Content: The attack also targets the attacker.

SubSections.Title: Undo Damage Bug
SubSections.Content: If reducing the success level causes the attack to miss, you gain T5 shield.

SubSections.Title: Speedrunner
SubSections.Content: You teleport to an empty point of your choice within range. The attacker also targets itself.

SubSections.Title: Quick Replace
SubSections.Content: You swap location (via teleportation) with a willing combatant within range that is not being attacked. The attack targets that combatant instead of you.

SubSections.Title: Cooldown
SubSections.Content: The cooldown replaces the limit.

SubSections.Title: Temporary
SubSections.Content: You swap back to your original position.

SubSections.Title: Hacker
SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes fortified 2, resilient 2, and protected 2 for 1 turn.

SubSections.Title: Inverse Effects

Parts: You gain a simple condition with an inverse for a duration.

SubSections.Content: You gain its inverse instead for the same duration.

SubSections.Title: Double
SubSections.Content: The limit is replaced.

SubSections.Title: Reflect
SubSections.Content: Choose the attacker or a willing combatant within range. The chosen combatant either gains the condition or its inverse for the duration.

SubSections.Title: Fateweaver
SubSections.Content: You gain immunity to the condition. The damage of your next attack is increased by T1d8.

SubSections.Title: Cheat

Parts: After a combatant within range makes an attack.

SubSections.Content: You either increase or decrease the natural result by 2.

SubSections.Title: Cooldown
SubSections.Content: The cooldown replaces the limit.

SubSections.Title: Improved
SubSections.Content: The natural result is increased or decreased by 4 instead.

SubSections.Title: Swindler
SubSections.Content: Before changing the result, you can roll a d20 and then choose whether to replace the natural result.

SubSections.Title: Trap Card

Parts: Before a combatant within range makes an attack.

SubSections.Content: All advantages count as disadvantages and all disadvantages count as advantages instead.

SubSections.Title: Double
SubSections.Content: The limit is replaced.

SubSections.Title: Perfect Trap
SubSections.Content: You either remove all advantages or disadvantages.

SubSections.Title: Strategist
SubSections.Content: You gain shield scaled with the difference between advantages and disadvantages equal to [difference * T5].

SubSections.Title: Torment
SubSections.Content: Your damage is increased by T2 against combatants that have a condition from you.

SubSections.Title: Sadistic Torment
SubSections.Content: Your damage is increased by T1d8 instead.

SubSections.Title: Seductive Torment
SubSections.Content: All combatants with a condition from you have their pacified severity increased by 1 until they lose it.

SubSections.Title: Psychic Torment
SubSections.Content: All combatants with a condition from you have their hopeless severity increased by 1 until they lose it.

SubSections.Title: Forbidden Curse

Parts: You apply a simple condition to a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The severity is increased by 1.

SubSections.Title: Cooldown
SubSections.Content: The cooldown replaces the limit.

SubSections.Title: Eternal
SubSections.Content: If the condition has a duration, the duration is doubled.

SubSections.Title: Excorcist
SubSections.Content: The severity is increased by 2 instead.

SubSections.Title: Sap

Parts: You apply a a simple condition with an inverse for a duration.

SubSections.Content: You gain its inverse for the same duration.

SubSections.Title: Double
SubSections.Content: The limit is replaced.

SubSections.Title: Recharge
SubSections.Content: After the duration, you regain 1 use.

SubSections.Title: Hexbond
SubSections.Content: You gain the condition instead of its inverse.

SubSections.Title: Inquisitor
SubSections.Content: The severities are increased by 1.

SubSections.Title: Curse Mirror

Parts: You gain a simple condition from another combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant also gains the condition until you lose it.

SubSections.Title: Double
SubSections.Content: The limit is replaced.

SubSections.Title: Recharge
SubSections.Content: After you lose it, you regain 1 use.

SubSections.Title: Hexbond
SubSections.Content: If the condition has an inverse, you gain its inverse instead.

SubSections.Title: Witch Hunter
SubSections.Content: Your damage is increased by T1d8 against the combatant.

SubSections.Title: Redirect Pain
SubSections.Content: Choose a willing combatant within range. The combatant takes [damage taken -/ 2] damage. You take no damage.

SubSections.Title: Cooldown
SubSections.Content: The cooldown replaces the limit.

SubSections.Title: Reflect Pain
SubSections.Content: The attacker takes [damage taken -/ 2] damage.

SubSections.Title: Shaman
SubSections.Content: The combatant no longer needs to be willing.
